title: looking for friends to play with
body: i'm looking for pretty muich anyone to play with i'm getting back into lol im lvl27 n love to play top lane i just want to lvl n play ranked as soon as possible with people who can also play ranked

replies.body: We have a team in our discord currently looking for a main top laner, feel free to come by. https://discord.gg/Y93kJJN
